attributes.action: either lower or keep tuition fees paid by students in the UK the same
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Say no to higher tuition fees and show your support for students all over the country.

rejection.details: It is unclear exactly what you wish the Government to do. Please add further explanation and resubmit your petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
